update tb_article set columnid = #{columnid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ispublic = #{ispublic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, istop = #{istop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, visits = #{visits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, thumbup = #{thumbup,jdbcType=INTEGER}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channelid = #{channelid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
UPDATE tb_article a SET a.`state`=1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE tb_article a SET a.`thumbup` = a.`thumbup` + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
